DOC.brief_title: The Effects Zataria Multiflora Boiss ( Shirazi 's Thyme ) Nonalcoholic Fatty Liver Disease
DOC.detailed_description: In randomized double-blind placebo-controlled clinical trial Shirazi 's Thyme compare placebo . Investigators select randomly 90 patient NAFLD inclusion criterion . Investigators measure anthropometric laboratory parameter include fast blood sugar , insulin , liver enzymes , lipid profile , grade sonography intervention 90 day later . Patients divide two equal group . Intervention group addition diet exercise recommendation receive capsule contain 700 mg Shirazi thyme powder daily 90 day . Placebo group addition recommendation diet exercise , receive placebo capsule twice daily .
